xwiki-bridge - (10:28): [Vincent Massol] hi guys  
xwiki-bridge - (10:30): [Vincent Massol] http://jira.xwiki.org/jira/browse/XAPANELS-105 is a problem.   
xwiki-bridge - (10:30): [Vincent Massol] If true, it may mean that the person who released has not tried to launch the home page. I think that when we release we need to do a minimal check, wdyt?  
xwiki-bridge - (10:30): [Vincent Massol] alternatively it means we should do a staging for 1 or 2 days before promoting  
xwiki-bridge - (10:31): [sdumitriu] The panel app shouldn't have been upgraded  
xwiki-bridge - (10:31): [Vincent Massol] yes  
xwiki-bridge - (10:31): [Vincent Massol] that's the cause, I'm looking at ways for this not to happen  
xwiki-bridge - (10:32): [Vincent Massol] we also need to decide if we need a 2.0.6 or not  
xwiki-bridge - (10:32): [Vincent Massol] personally I don't think so since we have a 2.1 final   
xwiki-bridge - (10:32): [Vincent Massol] but we should add it in the RElease notes  
xwiki-bridge - (10:32): [Vincent Massol] and explain how to fix it  
xwiki-bridge - (10:32): [Vincent Massol] wdyt?  
xwiki-bridge - (10:32): [sdumitriu] +1  
xwiki-bridge - (10:33): [Vincent Massol] hmm is 2.0.5 released?  
xwiki-bridge - (10:33): [Vincent Massol] I don't see it on http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/ReleaseNotes  
xwiki-bridge - (10:33): [Vincent Massol] ah it's there http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/ReleaseNotesXWikiEnterprise205  
xwiki-bridge - (10:33): [Vincent Massol] but not linked  
xwiki-bridge - (10:33): [Vincent Massol] fixing  
xwiki-bridge - (10:34): [Vincent Massol] sdumitriu: do you know if the other panel related issues will work in 2.0.5?  
xwiki-bridge - (10:34): [Vincent Massol] see http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/ReleaseNotesXWikiEnterprise205  
xwiki-bridge - (10:35): [Vincent Massol] XAPANELS-99 and XAPANELS-98  
xwiki-bridge - (10:35): [Vincent Massol] (ahah the bot only prints the first jira issue)  
xwiki-bridge - (10:35): [sdumitriu] 99 should work  
xwiki-bridge - (10:35): [sdumitriu] 98 I don't know, is the new skin version used?  
xwiki-bridge - (10:36): [tmortagne] no  
xwiki-bridge - (10:36): [Vincent Massol] the skin version is listed at the bottom of http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/ReleaseNotesXWikiEnterprise205  
xwiki-bridge - (10:36): [Vincent Massol] 1.5  
xwiki-bridge - (10:36): [sdumitriu] I don't see any skin issues in the release notes, so I think 2.0.5 wasn't updated  
xwiki-bridge - (10:36): [tmortagne] note that when a plugin/application is not compatible with a branch it's supposed to be locked down in XE pom...  
xwiki-bridge - (10:41): [sdumitriu] Hm, XAPANELS-98 is broken too  
xwiki-bridge - (10:41): [sdumitriu] Since it depends on XWIKI-4552  
xwiki-bridge - (10:41): [sdumitriu] And the new skin versions  
xwiki-bridge - (10:41): [sdumitriu] So there are two broken panels issues  
xwiki-bridge - (10:42): [Vincent Massol] what's the symptom for the user?  
xwiki-bridge - (10:42): [Vincent Massol] (so that I can add it to the RN)  
xwiki-bridge - (10:43): [tmortagne] and btw i don't have the same thing than http://jira.xwiki.org/jira/browse/XAPANELS-105 (instead of broken images i have juste "(RSS)") so i did not know it was not right  
xwiki-bridge - (10:43): [sdumitriu] Some panels will look ugly  
xwiki-bridge - (10:44): [sdumitriu] Navigation, which isn't displayed by default, RightsHelp and RightsTips, and maybe the PanelWizard  
Enygma` joined #xwiki at 10:45  
xwiki-bridge - (10:52): [Jérôme Velociter] Hi  
xwiki-bridge - (10:52): [Jérôme Velociter] does someone know the config parameter to use for velocity macros to be reloaded on each page?  
xwiki-bridge - (10:52): [Jérôme Velociter] IIRC one exists  
xwiki-bridge - (10:53): [sdumitriu] At least it used to exist  
xwiki-bridge - (10:55): [Jérôme Velociter] you think it disappeared with the componentization of the velocity module ?  
xwiki-bridge - (10:57): [sdumitriu] It's hardcoded now  
xwiki-bridge - (10:57): [sdumitriu] Hm, no  
xwiki-bridge - (10:58): [sdumitriu] xwiki.render.velocity.macrolist  
xwiki-bridge - (10:58): [sdumitriu] In xwiki.cfg  
xwiki-bridge - (10:58): [sdumitriu] But be careful, setting this will make it impossible to have per-skin macros  
xwiki-bridge - (10:59): [sdumitriu] It's in xwiki-core/com.xpn.xwiki.render.DefaultVelocityManager  
arkub left at 11:02 (Read error: 54 (Connection reset by peer)  
xwiki-bridge - (11:04): [Jérôme Velociter] sdumitriu: meaning I can only use it with macros files that are hardcoded in the list ?  
xwiki-bridge - (11:05): [Jérôme Velociter] (list of macros in the config)  
xwiki-bridge - (11:05): [Jérôme Velociter] sdumitriu: thanks  
xwiki-bridge - (11:06): [sdumitriu] Yeo  
xwiki-bridge - (11:06): [sdumitriu] Yep  
arkub joined #xwiki at 11:07  
xwiki-bridge - (11:08): [Jérôme Velociter] so I can probably hardcode the path to my skin macro file for the time I work on it  
xwiki-bridge - (11:10): [sdumitriu] Whoa, wait  
xwiki-bridge - (11:10): [sdumitriu] I totally forgot what I was looking for  
xwiki-bridge - (11:11): [sdumitriu] That simply allows to specify different macros files  
xwiki-bridge - (11:11): [sdumitriu] Not to reload them  
xwiki-bridge - (11:11): [Jérôme Velociter] ah ok:)  
xwiki-bridge - (11:12): [Jérôme Velociter] well i guess I can still move the macro I work on in the wiki  
xwiki-bridge - (11:14): [sdumitriu] Vincent Massol: Help  
xwiki-bridge - (11:14): [Vincent Massol] no idea  
xwiki-bridge - (11:14): [sdumitriu] Wait, I didn't ask the question  
xwiki-bridge - (11:14): [sdumitriu] props.putAll(this.configuration.getProperty(PREFIX + "properties", Properties.class));  
xwiki-bridge - (11:14): [Vincent Massol] :)  
xwiki-bridge - (11:14): [Vincent Massol] thought you were asking abuot macro reloading  
xwiki-bridge - (11:14): [sdumitriu] Where do I define the properties used by this code?  
xwiki-bridge - (11:15): [sdumitriu] Here PREFIX = "velocity."  
xwiki-bridge - (11:15): [Vincent Massol] wdym?  
xwiki-bridge - (11:16): [Vincent Massol] in xwiki.properties  
xwiki-bridge - (11:16): [Vincent Massol] is that what you mean?  
xwiki-bridge - (11:16): [Vincent Massol] #-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------  
xwiki-bridge - (11:16): [Vincent Massol] # Velocity  
xwiki-bridge - (11:16): [Vincent Massol] #-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------  
xwiki-bridge - (11:16): [Vincent Massol]   
xwiki-bridge - (11:16): [Vincent Massol] #-# [Since 2.0M1]  
xwiki-bridge - (11:16): [Vincent Massol] #-# Velocity Tools that will be available from your scripts. The format is  
xwiki-bridge - (11:16): [Vincent Massol] #-# velocity.tools.<name under which it'll be available in the context> = <class name>  
xwiki-bridge - (11:16): [Vincent Massol] #-# Default values (no need to add them)  
xwiki-bridge - (11:17): [Vincent Massol] #-#   velocity.tools = listtool = org.apache.velocity.tools.generic.ListTool  
xwiki-bridge - (11:17): [Vincent Massol] #-#   velocity.tools = numbertool = org.apache.velocity.tools.generic.NumberTool  
xwiki-bridge - (11:17): [Vincent Massol] #-#   velocity.tools = datetool = org.apache.velocity.tools.generic.DateTool  
xwiki-bridge - (11:17): [Vincent Massol] #-#   velocity.tools = mathtool = org.apache.velocity.tools.generic.MathTool  
xwiki-bridge - (11:17): [Vincent Massol] #-#   velocity.tools = sorttool = org.apache.velocity.tools.generic.SortTool       
xwiki-bridge - (11:17): [Vincent Massol] #-#   velocity.tools = escapetool = org.apache.velocity.tools.generic.EscapeTool  
xwiki-bridge - (11:17): [Vincent Massol] #-#   velocity.tools = regextool = org.xwiki.velocity.tools.RegexTool  
xwiki-bridge - (11:17): [Vincent Massol]   
xwiki-bridge - (11:17): [Vincent Massol] #-# [Since 2.0M1]  
xwiki-bridge - (11:17): [Vincent Massol] #-# Velocity configuration properties. The format is  
xwiki-bridge - (11:17): [Vincent Massol] #-# velocity.property.<Velocity property name> = <value>  
xwiki-bridge - (11:17): [Vincent Massol] #-# Default values (no need to add them)  
xwiki-bridge - (11:17): [Vincent Massol] #-#   velocity.properties = resource.loader = webapp  
xwiki-bridge - (11:17): [Vincent Massol] #-#   velocity.properties = webapp.resource.loader.class = org.apache.velocity.tools.view.servlet.WebappLoader  
xwiki-bridge - (11:17): [Vincent Massol] #-#   velocity.properties = velocimacro.messages.on = false  
xwiki-bridge - (11:17): [Vincent Massol] #-#   velocity.properties = resource.manager.logwhenfound = false  
xwiki-bridge - (11:17): [Vincent Massol] #-#   velocity.properties = velocimacro.permissions.allow.inline.local.scope = true  
xwiki-bridge - (11:17): [Vincent Massol] #-#   velocity.properties = runtime.introspector.uberspect = org.xwiki.velocity.introspection.ChainingUberspector  
xwiki-bridge - (11:17): [Vincent Massol] #-#   velocity.properties = runtime.introspector.uberspect.chainClasses = org.apache.velocity.util.introspection.SecureUberspector,org.xwiki.velocity.introspection.DeprecatedCheckUberspector  
xwiki-bridge - (11:22): [sdumitriu] Yes, that's what I mean  
xwiki-bridge - (11:22): [sdumitriu] Thanks  
xwiki-bridge - (11:23): [sdumitriu] Jérôme Velociter: velocity.properties=velocimacro.library.autoreload=true  
xwiki-bridge - (11:24): [sdumitriu] in xwiki.properties  
xwiki-bridge - (11:25): [Jérôme Velociter] sdumitriu: great! thank you  
xwiki-bridge - (11:25): [Jérôme Velociter] is it somewhere on xwiki.org ?  
xwiki-bridge - (11:25): [Jérôme Velociter] I'll check and add it  
xwiki-bridge - (11:25): [sdumitriu] Try it first  
xwiki-bridge - (11:26): [Vincent Massol] it should be in http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AdminGuide/Configuration (the way to configure velcity)  
xwiki-bridge - (11:26): [Vincent Massol] but I don't think it is  
xwiki-bridge - (11:26): [Jérôme Velociter] yes I'll try first  
xwiki-bridge - (11:26): [Vincent Massol] would be good to add  
xwiki-bridge - (11:26): [Vincent Massol] I'm talking about the gneeric way  
xwiki-bridge - (11:26): [Vincent Massol] to add velocity tools and properties  
xwiki-bridge - (12:01): [glerouge] Hi guys  
xwiki-bridge - (12:01): [glerouge] I'm trying to remove keyboard shortcuts from a page  
xwiki-bridge - (12:01): [glerouge] using a JSX and the followign snippet: http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Features/KeyboardShortcuts#HRemovingallshortcutsatonce  
xwiki-bridge - (12:01): [glerouge] but it doesn't seem to be working  
xwiki-bridge - (12:01): [glerouge] do you know where I should put the JS instead ?  
xwiki-bridge - (12:01): [Jérôme Velociter] try this in your JSX:  
xwiki-bridge - (12:02): [Jérôme Velociter] document.observe("dom:loaded", function(){  
xwiki-bridge - (12:02): [Jérôme Velociter]     // here you paset the code for removing shortcuts  
xwiki-bridge - (12:02): [Jérôme Velociter] });  
xwiki-bridge - (12:03): [glerouge] seems to be workign  
xwiki-bridge - (12:03): [glerouge] great, thanks  
arkub left at 12:03 (Read error: 60 (Operation timed out)

xwiki-bridge - (16:40): [lucaa] Vincent Massol: re our annotations discussion 2 days ago, I just changed everything, see my last commit and the updated "rendering an annotation" bullet in http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/AnnotationFeature#HSolution4addannotationsonspecifiedbutoptionaltargetrenderedbyaspecializedrenderer (just fyi)  
xwiki-bridge - (16:41): [Vincent Massol] ok reading  
xwiki-bridge - (16:41): [lucaa] we can voice chat if you think it's easier  
xwiki-bridge - (16:41): [Vincent Massol] yes  a bit hard to understand, but not now, I'd like to progress on other stuff  
xwiki-bridge - (16:42): [lucaa] ok  
xwiki-bridge - (16:42): [Vincent Massol] did you talk to thomas in the end?  
xwiki-bridge - (16:42): [lucaa] yes  
xwiki-bridge - (16:42): [lucaa] and we devised this change together  
xwiki-bridge - (16:42): [Vincent Massol] ok  
xwiki-bridge - (16:42): [Vincent Massol] then it should be good :)  
xwiki-bridge - (16:43): [lucaa] mmhkey  
xwiki-bridge - (16:43): [lucaa] :)  
xwiki-bridge - (17:12): [jvdrean] sdumitriu: is there a reason for not having overflow:auto on #xwikicontent ?  
xwiki-bridge - (17:12): [jvdrean] http://template.myxwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/XWikiSyntax#HLinks  
xwiki-bridge - (17:12): [Jérôme Velociter] is it normal fisheyes says me path not found for http://fisheye2.atlassian.com/browse/xwiki/platform/core/tags/xwiki-core-1.1.0 ?  
xwiki-bridge - (17:13): [sdumitriu] jvdrean: No idea  
xwiki-bridge - (17:13): [Jérôme Velociter] if you go there http://fisheye2.atlassian.com/browse/xwiki/platform/core/tags  
xwiki-bridge - (17:13): [Jérôme Velociter] the tag is listed and not greyed  
xwiki-bridge - (17:14): [tmortagne] well greyed is supposed to mean deleted but i can find it in http://svn.xwiki.org/svnroot/xwiki/platform/core/tags/xwiki-core-1.1.0/  
xwiki-bridge - (17:14): [jvdrean] Jérôme Velociter: I'd use http://svnsearch.org/svnsearch/repos/XWIKI/search if I were you  
xwiki-bridge - (17:14): [tmortagne] maybe a bug in fisheye  
xwiki-bridge - (17:14): [jvdrean] evalica: is there a reason for not having overflow:auto on #xwikicontent ?  
xwiki-bridge - (17:14): [jvdrean] http://template.myxwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/XWikiSyntax#HLinks  
xwiki-bridge - (17:15): [Jérôme Velociter] jvdrean: what request shall I use ?  
xwiki-bridge - (17:15): [Jérôme Velociter] xwiki-core-1.1 for path gives me nothign  
xwiki-bridge - (17:16): [jvdrean] Jérôme Velociter: you can use the completion  
xwiki-bridge - (17:16): [jvdrean] in the path field  
xwiki-bridge - (17:16): [Jérôme Velociter] ok  
xwiki-bridge - (17:16): [evalica] jvdrean: for not having? what do you mean?   
xwiki-bridge - (17:16): [evalica] jvdrean: we need it auto - because if we don have it.. the content of the tables will get out of the content - over the panel area  
xwiki-bridge - (17:17): [jvdrean] Jérôme Velociter: http://svnsearch.org/svnsearch/repos/XWIKI/search?path=%2Fxwiki-platform%2Fcore%2Ftags%2Fxwiki-core-1.1.0  
xwiki-bridge - (17:18): [Jérôme Velociter] how do I see plain files then?  
xwiki-bridge - (17:19): [Jérôme Velociter] there's nothing there http://svn.xwiki.org/svnroot/xwiki/xwiki-platform/core/tags/xwiki-core-1.1.0/ (that's the path returned by SVN search)  
xwiki-bridge - (17:19): [Vincent Massol] svn.xwiki.org only contains what's currently in the latest version of the repo  
xwiki-bridge - (17:20): [Vincent Massol] in other words it's the current content only  
xwiki-bridge - (17:21): [jvdrean] evalica: both are not good, in one case the table is overflowing on the right column, in the other it's last columns aren't visible  
xwiki-bridge - (17:22): [Jérôme Velociter] Vincent Massol: how can I browse old tags?  
xwiki-bridge - (17:22): [Vincent Massol] you'll need some server software installed I believe  
xwiki-bridge - (17:22): [evalica] jvdrean:  auto case: they aren't visible - but you have a scroll bar at the end of the page .. and if you drag the mouse over the table - you can see it's content - cause the windows is scrolled by the mouse movement  
xwiki-bridge - (17:23): [Vincent Massol] Jérôme Velociter: svnsearch or fisheye should allow you to do this  
xwiki-bridge - (17:23): [Jérôme Velociter] ok
